summary: The team discussed issues with checklist management in Salesforce and AIO systems, focusing on notification spam and workflow improvements. They explored solutions for managing archived checklists and ways to better control email notifications to referral partners.
key_topics: Email notification management for document uploads
decisions: Laura will implement a button in Salesforce to mark checklists as canceled rather than deleting them
Manual workaround for checklist management is acceptable in short term

action_items.task: Check with Nir about API capabilities for selective contact assignment in checklists
Fix Salesforce checklist deletion permission for Juan

concerns: Partners receiving too many email notifications
Lack of ability to customize checklist views for different user types
Manual process required for clearing old checklists
michael_priorities: Understanding if issues were must-haves vs nice-to-haves
Exploring possibility of role-based checklist views

commitments.commitment: Will implement Salesforce fix for checklist management
